branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, CY3R, Magnetically Coupled, Direct Mount w/Switch Rail
branchCategory.description: <p>The CY3R Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure. The CY3R series has resin based lube retainers installed on the dust seal to more evenly distribute lubricant for a reduction in minimum operating pressure. 70% longer wear rings will distribute a side load over a larger contact area for improved bearing performance. &nbsp;<span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the CY3R must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>
